wikipedia_page.main: Marian Pepler (24 August 1904 – 13 October 1997) was a British architect and textile designer.  She specialized in carpet and rug designs producing over 90, often individually named, designs.  She was an associate member of Royal Institute of British Architects, she held an Architectural Association diploma and featured on the National Register of Industrial Designers.

response: *Marian Pepler, 93, British architect and textile designer.
